attributes.action: Stop spend taxpyers hard earned money on pieces of art!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the nation is in crisis, is it really fair to ask people to fund artwork? They say it is investment for the country but we cannot afford to save for the future so we can live comfortable lives and businesses are closing down, why do we value these paintings so highly?  If you feel as angry as me about this issue, please sign this.
